markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Nessian Warhound](/Monsters.aspx?ID=260)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Believed to be bred by the Prince of Darkness himself within vast kennels in the infernal realm of Nessus, Nessian warhounds are the favored guards and hunting hounds of powerful fiends and, rarely, those mortals who worship them and have earned their favor.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Beast](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 26

**[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 26

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 9">[Nessian Warhound](/Monsters.aspx?ID=260)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Beast" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=20" />
<trait label="Fiend" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=70" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 205</row>

**Perception** +19; darkvision, scent (imprecise) 120 feet

**Languages**
[Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19); (can’t speak any language)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +18, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +19, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +18, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +20

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +5

**Con** +5

**Int** -2

**Wis** +4

**Cha** -2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 28 

**Fort** +21 

**Ref** +19 

**Will** +16 

</row>

**HP** 150

**Immunities**
fire

**Weaknesses**
cold 10

**Hellish Revenge** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** The Nessian warhound is critically hit by any Strike. **Effect** The Nessian warhound’s Breath Weapon recharges. It can immediately use it as part of this reaction.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +21 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d8+6 piercing plus 1d6 evil and 2d6 fire

**Breath Weapon** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) The warhound breathes flames that deal 10d6 fire damage to all creatures in a 15-foot cone (DC 28 basic Reflex save.) The warhound can’t use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds. If the Nessian warhound would take fire damage or be targeted by a fire effect, its Breath Weapon recharges.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-60" />
name: Nessian Warhound
